author: CBC News
title: Oil prices slip as Biden stops short of sanctioning Russian crude | CBC News
description: North American oil prices fell on Friday after U.S. President Joe Biden’s government signalled it won’t sanction Russian crude oil because of the impact it could have on pump prices.
content:
North American oil prices fell on Friday after U.S. President Joe Biden's government signalled it won't sanction Russian crude oil because of the impact it could have on pump prices.
